verbose_text: Expression of EBV proteins, EBNA-1, EBNA-2, EBNA-3A/3B/3C, LMP-1 and LMP-2, causes B cell and epithelial cell proliferation, increases viability of Burkitt lymphoma and NPC cells, and induces DNA damage and genomic instability XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, while EBV infection promotes chronic inflammation and reduces anti-tumor immune surveillance in the epithelium XREF_BIBR.
evidence: LMP-2, causes B cell and epithelial cell proliferation, increases viability of Burkitt lymphoma and NPC cells, and induces DNA damage and genomic instability
